channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: On dart road Whaddon gl525qn, 13th January
item.description:
There are a few potholes in the road One of them is deep and wide. Mostly outside 17 dart road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Dart Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep groove in road surface and potholes, 13th January
item.description:
Between Daisdybank House and Fir cottage there are multiple deep (but less than 10cm) potholes and channel in the road surface. Some of these potholes are linked together by the channel. It makes it tricky to drive along this section without potentially causing damage to road users tyres.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daisybank Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The signposted path is a narrow gap between two hedges. On one side there are overhanging branches on the other side brambles. it is almost unpassable., 13th January
item.description:
As per pinned location. It is the whole stretch between the road and the nearest field boundary (about 500m) that is totally overgrown.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Down Hatherley Lane, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights not detecting vehicles & constantly failing, 13th January
item.description:
These temporary traffic lights are causing massive issues and delays. Please resolve or at least put a worker onsite to detect when issues occur to manually move traffic. Sainsburys car park is jammed constantly as a result and the morning commute delays are miserable. Please resolve asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priors Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Two hige pothole one after another, 13th January
item.description:
Just past the bus stop outside entrance to crossfeileds Andoversford on Gloucter road One pot hole deep and another about a meter long and half a meter wide with large drop i to it. Has caused near accidents with cars and lorries avoiding it and a car tyre is on tje side of the road where a woman burst her tyre in it yesterday. Need fixing asap before somone crashes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Andoversford, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Approx 7-8 potholes - Horsefair st, 13th January
item.description:
On Horsefair st between St Maryâ€™s church & junction with Croft road there are approx 7-8 potholes Some potholes are now approaching 1.5-2m in length Given volume of potholes, which are getting bigger by the day, this road is causing issues for drivers & especially cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 110, Horsefair Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
